title: Revenue Cycle Management in Hospitals Redefined from Patient-to-Payment℠
description: nThrive believes that every one in every community deserves to know that their health, and their lives, are in capable, caring hands. Learn how nThrive can empower your organization's mission, from Patient-to-Payment.

title: Join nThrive at Becker's Hospital Review 9th Annual Meeting!
description: Visit nThrive booth #400 April 11-14, in Chicago, IL and enter to win a Bose Bluetooth speaker and an nThrive Patient-to-Payment℠ needs assessment. See you there!

title: From patient-to-payment: Why providers must reinvent RCM
description: Joel Hackney, Chief Executive Officer at nThrive discusses how half of the nation's 5,000+ hospitals are losing money for every patient they see and many are at risk of closing their doors in the next 18 months. Learn why providers must reinvent revenue cycle management in order to prevent this in this next article.

title: Three New Perspectives on the Revenue Cycle
description: Learn how a Patient-to-Payment solution can improve every stage of your revenue cycle and generate positive ROI.

title: RCM tip of the day: Approach ambulatory and outpatient visits with a different CDI lens
description: Healthcare organizations should look at outpatient and ambulatory clinical documentation improvement with specific attention on achieving proper reimbursement, according to Mark Hendricks, vice president of product management at nThrive.

title: Hospitals Acquired 5K Independent Practices from 2015 to 2016
description: A new study shows that hospital acquisitions of independent practices and hospital employment of physicians is continuing to accelerate.

title: CMS finalizes coverage of DNA sequencing for cancer patients
description: CMS has finalized Medicare coverage of diagnostic laboratory tests using next generation sequencing (NGS) for patients with advanced cancer.

title: Hospital prices see biggest gain in years
description: Hospital prices grew at their highest rate since 2009. Overall healthcare costs saw the highest increase since 2012.

title: Maryland's all-payer model saved Medicare millions in first 3 years
description: A review of the state program found that it's on track to meet CMS-imposed targets for savings and patient safety.

title: What are bundled payments?
description: Learn about bundled payments in health care and discover how to create a win-win scenario for both patients and providers. View the webinar replay to learn what steps health systems are taking to achieve financial and operational strength through a bundled payment strategy.

title: Revenue Cycle: Patient Segmentation Is Key to Mitigating Financial Risk
description: Erica Franko, Senior Vice President of Advisory Services and Kelley Blair, SVP & GM, Mid-America at nThrive, focus on aiding healthcare providers with Patient-to-Payment℠ solutions.

title: Hospitals are investing in clinical surveillance tools, but remain skeptical of vendor claims
description: Spyglass survey uncovers varying degrees of understanding which tools can be used for early warning and predictive indicators to prevent adverse health events.

title: Google's parent Alphabet, Microsoft and Apple have filed 300+ healthcare patents: 5 things to know
description: Alphabet, Microsoft and Apple have filed more than 300 healthcare patents between 2013 and 2017 – revealing the tech giants' increasing desire to disrupt the healthcare space, according to a new report.

title: Recruiting Health Care Staff Has Become a Major Problem for Hospitals
description: Almost one-third of hospitals reported not finding enough qualified candidates to fill open positions, indicating healthcare staffing and recruiting challenges for hospitals of all sizes.

title: Organizations Are Troubled by Post-Acute Care's Role in New Bundled Payments
description: CMS should include post-acute care providers as episode initiators in the new Medicare bundled payments model, the BPCI Advanced, industry groups urged.

title: More employers go direct to providers, sidestepping payers
description: A recent survey found that only 6% of employers contract directly with providers now, but 22% are considering it for 2019.

title: Medical coding audit success strategy
description: Learn how to build a successful Quality Coding Audit program in this nThrive blog and upcoming webinar. Join the session and earn one CEU at no cost.

title: CMS Shares Plans to Enable Interoperability, Value-Based Care
description: CMS Administrator Seema Verma detailed plans to enable value-based care through improved interoperability and health data exchange.

title: Patient Financial Responsibility Increased 11% in 2017
description: A new study revealed that patient financial responsibility increased 11 percent in 2017, and average out-of-pocket costs grew to over $1,800 by the end of 2017.

title: Should Congress Repeal the Merit-Based Incentive Payment System?
description: In separate editorials, industry experts called on Congress and HHS officials to either repeal or reform MACRA's Merit-Based Incentive Payment System (MIPS), citing quality measure issues.

title: 4 questions on Uber's new healthcare platform
description: There are potentially billions in savings, but little real evidence exists so far.

title: nThrive celebrates Holi in India!
description: Holi, also known as the "festival of colors", is a Hindu spring festival celebrated all across India as well as in several other countries.

title: Great Place to Work has certified nThrive
description: Anonymous nThrive colleague surveys led to the company being certified as a great place to work.

title: 'Cost' in healthcare means different things to many people: 3 questions with Marion General Hospital
description: Jeff Wakefield discusses two of the most pressing challenges healthcare CFOs face, the essential skills CFOs need in today's healthcare landscape and his financial priorities in 2018.

title: A report discovers the US healthcare system is not prepared for large-scale disasters
description: The Center for Health Security Project Team paper said the country does well with smaller scale crises, but needs to improve efforts to prepare for and respond to bigger events.

title: Apple to launch primary care clinics for employees
description: The clinic group says on its website it is seeking a primary care doctor, nurse coordinator and care navigator, and a job listing on a different site says the network will include "multiple state-of-the-art medical centers."

title: Uber launches healthcare platform
description: The dashboard, Uber Health, allows a healthcare worker to book a ride on demand or schedule a future ride for a patient.

title: Patient safety issues could drive $383B in healthcare costs by 2022
description: By 2022, avoidable adverse patient safety events across the U.S. and Western Europe, including healthcare-associated infections, sepsis and diagnostic errors, could cost $383.7 billion.

title: Denial Management: 8 Tips on How to Prevent Denied Claims
description: Get the top 8 denial management and prevention tips for your health care organization to eliminate payor denials before the claim is sent.

title: Front End Revenue Cycle: 5 Tips for Preventing and Managing Denials
description: Trouble with patient financial clearance on your hospital's front end can be the cause of denied claims in the back end of your revenue cycle. Read this blog from nThrive on front end revenue cycle management and denial prevention to learn more.
